::: details &nbsp;

[![Clash for Mac](https://img.shields.io/badge/Clash_for_Mac-2F80ED.svg?logo=apple&labelColor=b5b5b5)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/betavs/betavs/main/Applications/Clash/ClashX.dmg)
[![Clash for Windows](https://img.shields.io/badge/Clash_for_Windows-2F80ED.svg?logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,&labelColor=b5b5b5)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/betavs/betavs/main/Applications/Clash/ClashSetup.exe)
[![Clash for Android](https://img.shields.io/badge/Clash_for_Android-2F80ED.svg?logo=android&labelColor=b5b5b5)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/betavs/betavs/main/Applications/Clash/ClashPremium.apk)

| No. |                                  Config Link                                   |
| :-: | :----------------------------------------------------------------------------: |
| 01  | [clash-base](clash://install-config?url=https://api.betavs.cn/clash/base.yaml) |
| 02  | [clash-meta](clash://install-config?url=https://api.betavs.cn/clash/meta.yaml) |
| 03  | [clash-need](clash://install-config?url=https://api.betavs.cn/clash/need.yaml) |
| 04  | [clash-nock](clash://install-config?url=https://api.betavs.cn/clash/nock.yaml) |
| 05  | [clash-node](clash://install-config?url=https://api.betavs.cn/clash/node.yaml) |
| 06  | [clash-subs](clash://install-config?url=https://api.betavs.cn/clash/subs.yaml) |

:::

::: tip Usage

1. Download and Install Clash Client

   Choose the appropriate installation package for your system and complete the installation.

2. Import the Configuration

   Click on the desired Config Link from the list of available links. Your system will automatically launch the Clash client and import the configuration.

3. Confirm and Activate the Configuration

   In the Clash client, check if the new profile has been successfully added. Set it as the active configuration if needed.

4. Enable Proxy Service

   Start the proxy service in the Clash client. Ensure the system proxy is enabled to begin using the network service.

:::
